trans-unit.source: Overview diagram of Machine Learning Studio capabilities | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Overview diagram of Machine Learning Studio capabilities | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A printable diagram of the capabilities of Azure Machine Learning Studio, demonstrating how to use Studio to develop a predictive analytics experiment and operationalize it in the Azure cloud.
trans-unit.target: A printable diagram of the capabilities of Azure Machine Learning Studio, demonstrating how to use Studio to develop a predictive analytics experiment and operationalize it in the Azure cloud.

trans-unit.source: Overview diagram of Azure Machine Learning Studio capabilities
trans-unit.target: Overview diagram of Azure Machine Learning Studio capabilities

trans-unit.source: The **Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio Capabilities Overview** diagram gives you a high-level overview of how you can use Machine Learning Studio to develop a predictive analytics model and operationalize it in the Azure cloud.
trans-unit.target: The **Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio Capabilities Overview** diagram gives you a high-level overview of how you can use Machine Learning Studio to develop a predictive analytics model and operationalize it in the Azure cloud.

trans-unit.source: [Azure Machine Learning Studio](https://studio.azureml.net/) has available a large number of machine learning algorithms, along with modules that help with data input, output, preparation, and visualization.
trans-unit.target: [Azure Machine Learning Studio](https://studio.azureml.net/) has available a large number of machine learning algorithms, along with modules that help with data input, output, preparation, and visualization.

trans-unit.source: Using these components you can develop a predictive analytics experiment, iterate on it, and use it to train your model.
trans-unit.target: Using these components you can develop a predictive analytics experiment, iterate on it, and use it to train your model.

trans-unit.source: Then with one click you can operationalize your model in the Azure cloud so that it can be used to score new data.
trans-unit.target: Then with one click you can operationalize your model in the Azure cloud so that it can be used to score new data.

trans-unit.source: This diagram shows how all those pieces fit together.
trans-unit.target: This diagram shows how all those pieces fit together.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] See [Machine learning algorithm cheat sheet for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio](machine-learning-algorithm-cheat-sheet.md) for additional help in navigating through and choosing the machine learning algorithms available in Machine Learning Studio.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] See [Machine learning algorithm cheat sheet for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio](machine-learning-algorithm-cheat-sheet.md) for additional help in navigating through and choosing the machine learning algorithms available in Machine Learning Studio.

trans-unit.source: Download the Machine Learning Studio overview diagram
trans-unit.target: Download the Machine Learning Studio overview diagram

trans-unit.source: Download the **Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio Capabilities Overview** diagram and get a high-level view of the capabilities of Machine Learning Studio.
trans-unit.target: Download the **Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio Capabilities Overview** diagram and get a high-level view of the capabilities of Machine Learning Studio.

trans-unit.source: To keep it nearby, you can print the diagram in tabloid size (11 x 17 in.).
trans-unit.target: To keep it nearby, you can print the diagram in tabloid size (11 x 17 in.).

trans-unit.source: **Download the diagram here: [Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio Capabilities Overview](http://download.microsoft.com/download/C/4/6/C4606116-522F-428A-BE04-B6D3213E9E52/ml_studio_overview_v1.1.pdf)**
